Name: Moon River
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: There's a hint of aniseed in this fruity, sweet and sour drink.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Bar Opiume, Singapore.
Nutrition: One serving of Moon River contains 194 calories
